titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Okefenokee National Wildlife Refuge is a vital part of the ecology of Georgia and should be inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage Site list.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Okefenokee National Wildlife Refuge is a vital part of the ecology of Georgia and should be inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage Site list.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the nomination of the Okefenokee National Wildlife Refuge in Georgia as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
